title: Ravil Aryapov
text: Ravil Velimukhamedovich Aryapov (; born February 1, 1948 in Stavropol, now <a href="Tolyatti">Tolyatti</a>) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> coach and a former player. As of July 2009, he is an assistant coach with the reserve team of <a href="FC%20Krylia%20Sovetov%20Samara">FC Krylia Sovetov Samara</a>.
